name: Escape From The Underworld (JTGulick1)
description:
Please Full Screen The Game For Better Performance

In this game you play as the hero along side your sister. The gods are mad at you and send you to hell where you have to fight demons to escape; however, every time you die you wake back up in the start of hell. You and your sister have to fight your way out of hell.

You spawn in a randomly generated dungeon with a random amount of powerups and coins. You have to make your way throughout hell find the blue square and escape!
